document_name_accent: benh dau day than kinh sinh ba.json
subsection_content:
Painful symptoms of TN can appear intermittently with a feeling of strong spasms, like an electric shock. Pain usually occurs on one side of the face and can be caused by sound or touch. Pain can also be triggered by everyday actions, including:
Brush one's teeth; Shave; Make up; Touch your face; Eat and drink; Talk; The strong wind blew into my face
The pain will come in waves, lasting a few seconds or a few minutes
An episode of pain may last for days, weeks or months, then enter a period of remission. The condition may progress, with pain becoming more severe and frequent. In some cases, the pain is also accompanied by a constant aching feeling.
